content: **this is a nice tapestry crochet colorwork beanie that uses dk weight yarn this can be made in 3 different sizes ** **sizes ** child 20 adult regular 21-22 adult large 23 **stitches & techniques used ** chains single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet decrease changing color front and back post stitches back loop only **yarn ** #3 dk light worsted weight 130 yards a lion brand superwash merino 55 yards b rebel yarn co hand dyed dk or suitable substitutes **tools ** us size g/6 4 0 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge yarn needle scissors **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns **find the matching cowl here** 2 follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cold-snap-colorwork-cowl
